Asked whether the Downing Street director of communication had offered to step down on the Today programme this morning, David Cameron replied: I don't go into private conversations. The Pentagon's training of Iraqi police was delayed by "objections of some in the State Department bureaucracy" and Colin Powell 's "turf-conscious deputy," Dick Cheney Armitage. DALLAS- NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell is not concerned about Michael Vick being billed as the host of a Super Bowl party because the Eagles quarterback told him it's not true. He has said that on numerous occasions people have been using his name about being involved in some type of a party and he had no intention of participating in that, Roger Goodell said. Speaking at his annual Super Bowl news conference Friday, the commissioner said he's spoken with Michael Vick three times in the last two weeks about his plans. "
